item.name: Oracle/Instance is active and open on {$ORACLE.DATABASE}
Oracle/Size of user data (without temp) on {$ORACLE.DATABASE}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template DB Oracle by Javora:javora[{$ORACLE.USERNAME},{$ORACLE.PASSWORD},{$ORACLE.HOST},{$ORACLE.PORT},{$ORACLE.DATABASE},tablespace,{#TABLESPACE}].last()}={$ORACLE.FS_P_USED_HIGH} and {Template DB Oracle by Javora:javora[{$ORACLE.USERNAME},{$ORACLE.PASSWORD},{$ORACLE.HOST},{$ORACLE.PORT},{$ORACLE.DATABASE},tablespace_abs,{#TABLESPACE}].last()}<{$ORACLE.FS_FREE_LOW}
trigger_prototype.name: Oracle/Tablespace {#TABLESPACE} used on {$ORACLE.DATABASE} high

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template DB Oracle by Javora:pyora[{$ORACLE.USERNAME},{$ORACLE.PASSWORD},{$ORACLE.HOST},{$ORACLE.PORT},{$ORACLE.DATABASE},tablespace,{#TABLESPACE}].last()}={$ORACLE.FS_P_USED_HIGH} and {Template DB Oracle by Javora:pyora[{$ORACLE.USERNAME},{$ORACLE.PASSWORD},{$ORACLE.HOST},{$ORACLE.PORT},{$ORACLE.DATABASE},tablespace_abs,{#TABLESPACE}].last()}<{$ORACLE.FS_FREE_LOW}
trigger_prototype.name: Oracle/Tablespace {#TABLESPACE} used on {$ORACLE.DATABASE} high
